description: Create a new external identification type
permissions: Requires an admin user; policy create? requires is_user_admin?.
side_effects: Creates a new external identification type record.
validation_notes: --name is required and must be unique. --can-apply-to is required and must include at least one entity type; each entry must be one of: Broker, BrokerInvoice, Customer, CustomerCommitment, CustomerTender, Developer, Equipment, Job, JobProductionPlan, JobProductionPlanMaterialType, JobSite, Laborer, MaterialPurchaseOrder, MaterialPurchaseOrderRelease, MaterialSite, MaterialSupplier, MaterialType, Project, ProjectCostClassification, ProjectRevenueClassification, ProjectRevenueItem, ProjectTransportLocation, ProjectTransportOrganization, ProjectTransportPlanEvent, ProjectTransportPlanSegment, ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSet, TradingPartner, TransportOrder, TransportOrderStop, Trucker, TruckerInvoice. --format-validation-regex must be a valid regex if provided. value_should_be_globally_unique must be true or false.

flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.description: Entity types this can apply to (required, comma-separated)
flags.validation: Required; must include at least one entity type. Allowed values: Broker, BrokerInvoice, Customer, CustomerCommitment, CustomerTender, Developer, Equipment, Job, JobProductionPlan, JobProductionPlanMaterialType, JobSite, Laborer, MaterialPurchaseOrder, MaterialPurchaseOrderRelease, MaterialSite, MaterialSupplier, MaterialType, Project, ProjectCostClassification, ProjectRevenueClassification, ProjectRevenueItem, ProjectTransportLocation, ProjectTransportOrganization, ProjectTransportPlanEvent, ProjectTransportPlanSegment, ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSet, TradingPartner, TransportOrder, TransportOrderStop, Trucker, TruckerInvoice.

flags.name: --format-validation-regex
flags.validation: Must be a valid regex if provided.

flags.name: --value-should-be-globally-unique
flags.description: Whether values must be globally unique
